content.detailedDescription:
Went out to look at the sky as usual, but felt compelled to go out at 10:30pm for some reason. i walked out to the edge of my fence (about 30' from my back door) and looked up toward the east. just above i saw the stars, then all at once two reddish/orange oval shaped objects appeared. they flew in a straight line from south to north for about 15 seconds and disappeared into nothing! there was no sound.  the lights were a dull reddish/orange and didn't seem to emit any other light around them except to themselves. they appeared out of total darkness...Just all at once, and were visible for only a few seconds before instantly  disappearing. i've never seen anything like these lights. i couldn't tell if they were attached to each other, but they were going the exact same speed and one was a little to the side of the other. i feel so blessed to have seen these awesome lights!  i just stood there in total disbelief, feeling in my heart these were star ships from somewhere else! 

if i never see additional lights like these in my lifetime i will still be happy to have seen these...They were amazing!
content.summary: Two reddish/orange silent oval  shaped lights.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting took place in the spring of 1999. i happened to be 11 years old at the time but remember the event vividly. i was riding in the car with my mother and younger sister on our way to school. we came up to the stop sign at the end of the road facing east. the sun was coming up and you could easily see a star about 45 degrees in the sky. the star grabbed my attention because it started pulsating and getting brighter. i don't believe it's a star at all actually, it's in the sky most times of the year and day and doesn't flicker like other stars. anyway, we all sat there and watched the star for a couple of minutes. very suddenly, another bright star-like object seemed to drop down very quickly from the original star. it circled the star a few times and then seemingly became stationary. the object came closer and closer, very quickly. it stopped and hovered above a few houses right in front of us. it was about 300ft long (estimating) on each of its three sides. we all had a very long time to take a look at it because it didn't move for almost 15 minutes. three glowing circles were on the underside. all three changed color from blue to green to red and orange. it made absolutely no sound at all, and it didn't move. i was very scared, and couldn't believe what i was looking at. then all of a sudden it accelerated west and out of sight in a split second. i believe it came out of or from that star. it's always there and wonder if its the international space station. this memory has been disturbing me for 10 years.
content.summary: Triangle sighting over neighborhood.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i stepped out back for a small cigar and cigarette respectively at about 1am in the morning (we had been up late playing some video games).  i saw a light that looked like no other star i've see before (i own a telescope) and after watching it for a few moments while smoking the cigar i could actually tell it was moving. at this time i still thought it was nothing (being a huge skeptic and thinking ufos are bs) but after continually observing it i was able to logically rule out anything i thought it could be.  it was at this time i told my brother about it.  i almost jokingly, "i think this might be a ufo here" (still just not really believing what i was seeing.  it was bright with colors rotating throughout it (90% sure these colors were just red, green, blue but there could have been subtleties i didn't completely perceive).  there were strobing lights coming from it at times, radiating out at least 5 times the width of the object.  it moved but not very fast, and it appeared to move back and forth a little but mostly in a single direction.  i tried to get some video but my handheld hd camera wouldn't pick it up in such light conditions.  my brother got his binoculars out of his truck and we observed it through those.  you could then clearly see it was almost a chrome light, and the colors made it almost look like a pearl glowing very brightly.  you could see the strobes very clearly with the binoculars.  after observing it for a while we went back in due to how cold it was but would step out and look at it every few minutes.  we almost convinced ourselves it was a star but then on the next trip out it was gone.  i've always thought ufos were just people seeing planes, etc but this was unreal.  still i think at the most it's just some advanced military craft.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright multi-colored (green, red, blue, white) orb with colors rotating.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking the dog at around 9:35. it had been raining all day, yet the skies were clear. i was looking at the stars and watching the air traffic in the area after having dinner with my wife.
i continued walking, and facing west, noticed something moving in the sky. i looked up to observe a very small, very dimly lit triangular object moving roughly northwest, very quickly. 
it had very small, very dim white lights on the bottom, at least 6 or 8, and appeared to be very low, under 5,000 ft by my estimation. there was absolutely no sound, and the street i was nearby was very quiet at the time.
the object moved very quickly, and went behind the apartments ahead of me before i had a chance to get to a better viewing position.
this object was clearly not a helicopter, small plane, or commercial aircraft. it was too small, too quiet, too dimly lit, and too fast. 
i was immediately struck with disbelief, and felt like it had to be something easily explainable, but the more i thought about it, the less likely that seemed.
content.summary: Observed silent, small dimly lit triangle object flying low.

content.detailedDescription: About a year out of high school a good friend along with our girl friends where making out in a city park, where as i opened my eyes i saw lights off a tree we where leaning against and i turned to see the extraterrestrial space craft about a city block away and about a block high, motionless no sound and no wind being generated nothing, but an intelligence we felt not of this world, as we have nothing and i don't care what we have revers engineered~ this craft must be thousands of years ahead of any technology we now have! it hung motionless for about ten minutes then tipped down towards a fair that was going on at the time as if to have been attracted buy the lights of the fair rides, it remained that way for about five minutes then slowly straight ed out again, it stayed that way for about five more minutes then began leaving at about twenty mile increments at high speed until it was out of sight! people where climbing on to there garages and houses to get better views the whole time. my friends an i where very exited and ran to my girl friends house to report it to the news, they said they had a flood of calls in on this sighting, soon we saw on the news that the authority's claimed~ it was a plain carrying an advertisement sign.  well i must say  after that obvious lie! i lost my trust in our authority`s, it made me so mad that the gull of these few people if you want to call them that! put me on a quest to find out who and what and why this grope feel thy know whats best for use from cradle to the grave and that they are better than the common man, and have lost them self's to these grays and the power that is offered to them by these beings that feed on our fear an violence. but to there dismay they must be unaware of how many people are on to there plans and destructive intentions! for the truth is spreading fast. and justice will prevail! they claim this cover up is best for the people, but ignorance to the truth is never the best course, they are wepponizing space and pissing off a lot of our galactic family`s, and they all will have to deal with the highest advanced beings soon! so have your fun now because your existence is but a flash in time, and if you read this, you better pray that existence is [not] for an eternity! your brother steven.B
content.summary: Myself along with three friends and hundreds of others saw a ufo in the seventies.

content.detailedDescription:
Long description of sighting report 
i remember watching the movie about the kid waking up in the woods after getting to ride in the ufo. he got taken up and got to pilot with a cute little alien. he found his house on the lake cause his brother shot fireworks. 
i was coming home on e night on my bike. i was gonna cut through the woods. i still remember telling myself not to. i imagined a log laying across the trail. it was a short trail that ended right back on the street. it was supposed to be a little detour. it was i guess in the year 2001. i believe in angels. so maybe that was it. i didn't see anything. i went on the trail and instead of coming right back off i ended up in another patch of woods half way across campus. there is no way because the trail doesn't cross the street and i never did. it would have taken me a good ten or more minutes to ride that distance. but i entered the trail and ended up on the other side and opposite direction from where i was headed. which is impossible. i know the streets and i know the places but i don't feel like being a scientific experiment. all i know is that i defied logic. somehow i ended up in a place that didn't connect with the one i tumbled in. i have gone over and over the area to try to see if maybe i was wrong about it. but i don't think i am. to god be the glory 

34degree 12'58.51"n 77degrees 51'55.00"w riegel rd. was gonna go on this sand trail heading towards campus and end up on 34 degrees 13'oo.70"n 77degrees 51'57.52"w plyler drive. just a short couple minutes. i ended up from riegel rd start spot all the way over to 34degrees 13'12.39"n 77degrees 52'04.56"w walton drive. 
i never crossed plyler or l street. i stayed in the woods and ended up leaving woods but not the same ones i entered. i never really thought about it. that night i was unsure of how i ended up so far off the path. 
strange
content.summary: Invisible

content.detailedDescription: Walking down appersonway heading south i stop at the intersection of fischer street and as i looked to the west i saw orange lights coming on in sequence about 4 or 5 degrees apart.  the lights turned off in sequence in the matter of 5 seconds.  i took these to be flares because i have seen flares before in that area.  this event occurred about 15 degrees above the horizon and appeared to be in the order of 1 to 3 miles away. after those lights went out, 10 to 12 lights appeared just to the north of the area as the first lights. they appeared to be spaced approximately a fingernails length apart. they looked like a string of beads, in a circular pattern going around an object. they were orange.  i noticed the lights were on all at the same time and they went out all at the same time not in sequence which was different from the earlier lights i observed. i took that the two events could have been connected because they were in the same time and area. i thought the second lights were not flares because the lights were not spaced apart only a small degree compared to the lights before which i believe could have been flares.  also, because the lights all shut out together at the same time made them appear suspicious.
content.summary: I saw lights coming on and off in sequence in north end of kokomo.

content.detailedDescription:
On 03-10-09, roughly 11:30-11:40pm, i was driving east on us route 64.  as i approached the first exit for nashville, (nc), i noticed an object hovering along, as if following, alt us 64. this object was around 75-100 feet above the ground.  i had thought it was maybe a military helicopter, but i began to think differently when i actually noticed the lights.

i noticed that it did have 3 visible lights.  two red lights toward what appeared to be the rear, and a bright white light near the front.  it was about 200-300 yards from me.  i judged the size of the object to be between 40-50 feet wide between all three lights.  i knew by then, that this was not a helicopter.

the object proceed to hover over us route 64 in a south-southeast direction.

as i approached the exit, i watched it disappear behind a small grove of trees, then came back into view.  it continued to move in the same direction until it stopped and began to hover near a small shopping center.

i stopped my truck (tractor-trailer) on the off ramp and turned off the engine, then got out to observe the object.

it made no sound.  (not even a humming or whirring sound.) 

the lights from the parking lot only slightly illuminated the object.  i could barely make out a shape.  it did look like a chevron shape, only thicker that made it look almost like a triangular shape.

it continued to hover in that spot for about 5-7 minutes, then proceed to move away in the south-southeast direction.  i continued to watch the object for another couple of minutes until it moved out of my sight.

i had a small digital camera, but in my excitement of watching this object, i never thought to snap a photo.

sincerely,
randall breason

p.S. i have attached a crude drawing of what the object looked like.  the lighting that night was rather dim, but through that reflecting parking lot lights i could still make it out.  it is the best description i can do.
content.summary: Spotted hovering above road.

content.detailedDescription:
This is my secound encounter and as i sit here my heart is starting to race.Ok.This sighting happend in january of 1996.It was witnessed by me my wife,also her secound(reported to mufon already)and my brother in-law.It was 10 pm and we were in pasadena texas and lived on vista between the beltway and burke st..We were on our way to block buster to take back some movies.My wife is driving,im in the passenger seat and my brother in-law behind me.Where driving down vista and im looking out the window and notice what i thought was an airplane.Being that we live around air ports its normal to see them flying.But this thing.Im picturing it my head now and this thing had no lights and it was dark.Thats what caught my attn. but what really got me to say something was it was just sitting there.At that time it was a distance away.I told them look,look what is that.My wife and my brother in-law start to watch with shock.By this time we are coming up to a turn.The street im talking about is the entrance to bayshore hospital.This part is were it gets wierd.We want to see this obect so we make the turn and pull into a drive way of the townhouses.But what was first at a distance,and this is were i have to explain becouse its so strange.As soon as we put the car in park we jump out and the next thing we see is this craft right above us.As i write this im feeling real angsiaty now.What i remember is im looking up and can see the bottom it dark in color but i can see that its ridged.In that instance when we jumped out it started moving away totally silent we watch it float away,and we then go on to block buster.For some reason after this encounter when i think now we never talked about it.Til now.This thing was so larg i dont remember even seeing the sides of it.
now what im about to tell you is why im reaching out to mufon.This is what i just found out about my wifes memory of the sighting.She said she did remember seeing the craft and thinking like we were what is this.I asked her what do you remember when we jumped out of the car?And i was shocked to what she told me.She said that as soon as we jumped out she saw a bright white light coming from the bottom of the craft.This gave me chills.Then she told me "thats what i thought it was weird hearing you say it was black and ridged,she recalled a engulfing light.So this is the reason i felt so strongly on reporting.But nervous as i start to put things together,its overwellming.This craft was over us,and the hospital was no more then 500 ft.From us.This was me and my wifes secound encounter and this one was so diffrent then the first.You might be asking about my brother in-law.Just recently he has made contact with us.Since we havent seen him in 9 years.Im going to write him and ask him about that nite in 96.I am going to make no mention of what i have reported today to him in hopes to discover another piece of this puzzle.I will surely keep everyone informed.(story is completly true).And the reason im here is to hopefully get some answers. i am serious about this and would only want serious feed back.If i can make contact with someone i can trust i want to tell you of the dream i had a couple of years later that really got this ball rollin.Thnx so much-brother rob
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: My description of the craft has two parts. along with questions i have about it.

content.detailedDescription:
estava um dia claro e sem nuvens n���o me lembro bem a dta mas era m���s de dezembro;
 fui pro lado de fora de casa receber ar fresco pois estava calor afinal era ver���o. chegando do lado de fora comecei a sentir uma sensa������o de est��� sendo observado mas olhava pros lados e n���o via ningu���m me observando mesmo assim estava com aquela sensa������o; quando de repente olhei pra cima!
 a principio pensei que era um bal���o!;at��� a��� tudo bem,mas aquele objeto parecia esta me observando,voltei a olhar pra ele e come���eia observa-lo!
 achei estranho o seu formato oval e parecia que ele estava andando em cima de um muro em limha reta,um muro invis���vel...
 outra coisa que achei estranho ��� que se fosse um bal���o ele n���o ele teria voado desordenadamente mas n���o! ele estava em linha reta e parecia est��� caminhando em camaralenta... quando ele observou que eu estava prestando aten������o nele...Ele saiu em disparada com uma velocidade incrivel em linha reta! fiquei realmente assustado e espantado...
 o mais interessante disso ��� que ap���s esta vis���o (que ocorreu em plena luz do dia!) dias depois aconteceu aquele famoso caso do incidente em varginha!
 
 e a cidade de varginha fica pr���ximo de cosm���polis(s���o paulo),mas em outro estado (minas gerais)!
 infelizmente n���o tive camera fotogr���fica para registrar o fato!
 eu nunca acreditava nessa historia de ovni,mas depois desse dia acredito!
 e n���o irei subestimar o que as pessoas viram!
content.summary: era muito parecido com uma bola de futebol americano.

content.detailedDescription:
Coming from boston on sunday night 3/22/09 at about 9; 05 pm. we live in nh 03053.   i pulled into my driveway and looked up at the stars because they were so bright.
i saw what i assumed was a satellite, and said to my wife and two kids hey look at the satellite, they got out of the car and looked up and said where? my wife and daughter went in the house. 
at that point i couldn't see anything moving.
then i said, oh i could have sworn i saw something moving. 
my son said oh yaw there it is, and it was moving slower than a few seconds before when i saw it from in the car.
i looked at the corner of the roof of the house to see if it was really moving and it was.
then it started moving a little faster so you could easily see that it was moving. 
we watched it for a couple of seconds and i saw it jerk real quick to the right about an inch, (as your looking at the stars) and then back. i thought that it was my eyes playing tricks on me so i didn't say anything , but my son said hey that moved back and forth real fast didn't it .I said with total surprise you saw that ? and he said yaw it moved, i asked what direction it moved in, and he motioned with his hands what it did. showing the same direction and movement.
then as we watched, it picked up speed moving in the same direction (north) and it moved really fast and we lost sight of it in a few seconds.
content.summary: Object moved at different speeds and made unusual jerking movement.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside, it was about 10 degrees out. what i saw , brilliant white flashing low in the southern sky almost looked like heat lightning, but because it was so cold i knew it couldn't be! for about 15 minutes i watched random flashes of brilliant white light in the due south. the next morning, i mentioned this to one of my students and he said theat he and ceveral firneds saw the same thing at the same time but they were in ellsworth and their flashing lights were due north
content.summary: 5 separate people in 3 different locations saw a series of brilliant white light flashes low on the horizon in random patterns.

content.detailedDescription: I had been driving since yesterday morning on my way back to mesa where rick p. and i were renting a house.  it was february  15, 1979 at night although i don���t know what time it was, the sky was crystal clear as i made my way through the mountains from winslow down to the valley.  there was literally no one else on the road, so i was able to use both lanes as i speeded around mountain curves.  i was close to strawberry and there was still snow covering the ground when i looked up through the windshield to see a strange aircraft moving west to east fairly slowly.  it was a golden color light and looked like it had light protrusions sticking out from the center.  i saw no blinking lights at all and as it moved to my left it drove my curiosity enough to totally stop on the road and roll down my window so i could hear the sound it made.  i stuck my head out the window, but there was no sound.  just about then it���s light dimmed to the illumination of just a star and it speeded up quickly moving to above a mountain towards the north  and it stopped and hovered.  well i rolled up my window and started driving down the mountain and i thought ���did i just see a ufo��� and as i thought about what i just saw i tried to figure out what else it could be.  i was driving at about 80 mph and after about 5 minutes i was down below the snow level and the road turned with the mountain from a southerly direction to an easterly direction and i glanced to my left to look north at the mountain the aircraft was hovering over, and it was still there, but just then a rock pile on the side of the road blocked my view and when i had drove beyond it i could see it sitting there not moving.  i jammed on my brakes coming to a screeching halt.  rolled down my window and looked at it. it came at me so bright so fast that within a half a second it had moved 10 miles to right in front of my face. the light was so bright, i was so scared i was shaking and couldn���t find first gear for seemed like forever, but i nailed the gas and the thing  started following along side just off the edge of the road which was a 300 foot drop.  i was able to get that car up to 90 mph and the object stayed with me for 10 minutes. as i drove i was nervous and i kept looking at my speedometer and then at the object hoping gravity would pull my car faster until i came around the mountain where you could see the lights of phoenix.  the valley was lit with a million twinkling lights.  the object appeared to speed up and then disappeared over the valley.  i could not believe what i just witnessed. was this a ufo?  as i continued to drive home i could not wait to tell someone.  as i drove i finally made it down to the desert floor and after about 3 miles i looked up and saw it again just hovering about 100 feet above the desert in front of me where i had to drive. i slowed down to 20 mph and it crossed over the road in front of me.  but it still was hovering about 100 feet off the road.  although i was scared i kept driving and as i passed just off to the left under it i could see it was more of a large object and the golden light was under it.  after i went passed it, it did not move from it���s hovering position.  now i started driving at normal speed trying to make it home.  i had a long way to go because floods had washed out all the roads through the river bed.  the only crossing point was in tempe on the mill st. bridge.  that took about an hour.  when i got home it was 3a.M. and rick was sound asleep.  well i decided to just go to bed and tell him about it in the morning.
content.summary: Followed by object.

content.detailedDescription: My mom and i had gone out birthday shopping at the mall.  at around 6:30pm, i noticed an extremely bright object in the western skies, which i didn't believe to be a star or a planet, as it was still relatively early and there wasn't a single other star in the skies.  i observed it, what i believed it to be the same object, move through the sky, at which point, i asked my mom to attempt to follow it.  i managed to get a couple of pictures with her camera on her phone, but they didn't come out very good.  the object remained stationary in the sw sky as we were driving home.  at which point i called my brother and told him to look in the sw skies for the object, at which point he said that he didn't believe it to be anything because he has observed the same thing in the sky for the past 2 weeks!  i got home and began charging the video camera, at which point, i observed the extremely bright object, waay brighter than anything i had ever seen in the skies before, in the sw sky just above the trees.  i wasn't positive (and still aren't "positive" that it was a ufo or an alien craft), but it did appear to move slightly during the duration of its presence.  then, i also noticed at least two other, smaller, but clearly moving star-like objects not far from the main object that seemed to be sort of circling the main object approximately 2-300 yards away.  not unlike/very similar, but differing in its luminescence from the other star-like object i observed and reported last year.  i did manage to get about 30 seconds of one of the smaller, clearly moving star-like objects (unfortunately, our video camera battery wasn't charged and unfortunately we can not pre-charge the battery and leave it charged, most likely due to its age), but i also managed to capture about 30-45 mins of the main, extremely bright object as well.  after observing it for that amount of time, i went back inside the house for no more than approx. 15-20 mins., at which point i went back outside and found that the object was gone!  the sky was still clear so i knew it hadn't gone behind any clouds.  then, a short distance from where the object had appeared when it was stationary, i saw, what i believed to be the same extremely bright object, moving just above and thru out the trees in the eastern direction, which i did manage to get on tape!  i saw the object in the same general direction for the following 3-5 days but haven't seen it in the skies since.  i am still unsure of just what it was, but would like to have the video analyzed.
content.summary: Extremely bright star-like object observed for over 2 hours in sw sky.

content.detailedDescription: On march 2nd, 2009, my mom and i were out birthday shopping at the mall, when i noticed, alone in the early evening sky, as there were absolutely no other stars or planets in the sky at that time (starting at around 6:30pm), i noticed an extremely bright star-like object hovering over the mall.  it appeared to move across the sky at times, and then go back to remaining stationary.  i called my brother and told him to look to the west, to which he replied that he didn't think it was anything because he's seen it almost every night of the past 2 weeks.  i thought, maybe, it was the planet venus, but it was just soooooo damn bright!!  brightest thing i've ever seen in the skies!  when i got home, i started charging the video camera... and then i started seeing other strange, star-like objects in the skies not far from the main, brightest object, that seemed to sort of circle it in essence.  there were no blinking lights on the clearly smaller, moving star-like objects and they were very similar, but not exact in their luminescence to the other star-like object i saw/reported last year.  i managed to get about 30 seconds of the smaller, clearly moving star-like object (due to the fact that our video camera wasn't charged and you can't pre-charge the battery and keep it charged) but i did manage to capture about 30-40mins of the main, bright star-like object in the sw sky, which, after observing it, went inside for no more than 15-20 mins, went back out and it was gone... at which point, a short distance away from where it had been stationary, and did appear to be moving slightly, i saw, what i believe was the same bright, star-like object moving just above and thru the tree-line, which i also managed to catch on video tape.  i'm not saying that it was "for sure" a ufo or an alien craft, but it remained in the sky for approx. the next 4-5 days, at which point, i haven't been able to locate it since.
content.summary: For approx. 2-3 hours, i watched an extremely bright star-like object in the sw skies.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside doing yard work when i looked up to the sky and saw this "white speck" in the sky. i thought it was odd because it just that a speck like a hole in the blue sky. at first i thought it was a balloon. it was somewhat cloudy with winds heading north east. i observed it as it just hung there, so that theory was debunked. it wasn't a star it was as white as the cloud heading towards it, later that cloud obscured my line of sight (five minutes into observation). i ran into my house to get my camera hoping it'll still be there. as i waited for the cloud to pass i noticed it had gone. the thing that got my goat was that when i went on to finish my work a very high flying and fast plane  passed right over the same area with a long contrail behind it. i was facing a little right over los angeles and it was high in the sky...I tried to focus my eyes on it . it was oval at first sight but as i focused it had a linear shape. shadows could be seen with angles. i hope other people had this same experience.
content.summary: Ufo over l.A.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched to see if it would cause an explosion or fire when it hit the ground but nothing occurred. it just seemed to come to a soft quiet landing. i watched all local news for a story about a meteor or space junk or anything that would have explained what i saw but nothing. i find it hard to believe i was the only person who saw it coming down especially since it took so long for it to fall out of the sky.I have seen many planes,helicopters,and shooting stars in the sky above my home but this was a new sight and i would love any info. on what it might have been.If it helps i can even tell you right where it came down at because it was right over a pair of red lights that flash at night to warn pilots of high lines and structures. thanks to that i will never forget the exact spot i saw this glowing ball go behind the trees. if anyone is ever interested in looking for what fell that night i would be glad to show you where i last saw it. i will admit i am very interested in finding out what it was or is for that matter.
 1)where-on my back porch in cartersville,ga.
2)noticed object because it was 10 times brighter then any other star in the sky at that time and looked for blinking lights that would have told me it was a plane no lights at all.
3)shooting star
4)realized it wasn't losing size,color,shape,and it was moving very very slow and in a straight line down it also had no tail or smoke tail.
5)it was going so slow i hoped my husband would get home in time to see it so i never took my eyes off of it as it went down so i could point it out to him when he got home.I also thought it might cause a fire due to the dry conditions in the woods but i never even saw any kind of reaction in the area it landed in.
6)went behind some trees and seemed to land softly.
content.summary: Very bright star like object. brightest object in sky at that time. i watched as it fell to earth in controlled fall very slow and object never changed shape or size during its descent. it took over 10 mins. and was very controlled in its flight.

content.detailedDescription:
On the canadian side at the fallsviews casino hotel i took a pic of the falls because the sunrise was perfect..As i snapped 2 picture of the 
falls within seconds i came home and uploaded the pic's and i found
 a object/ufo/no one can identify--like no aircraft #'s ext.But the
rest of the pic is clear.Trasportation canada searched the camera's
at all the nearby hotels and no object found
content.summary: Object was there and then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife, child and i were visiting my father-in-law today at his place by medina lake here in san antonio, texas. i took my daughter on a small tractor ride through a dense wooded area about a mile from the lake itself. 

my daughter was on my lap steering when she suddenly pointed up at this object directly in front of us about 100 yards and around 30 feet off the ground. she turned around quickly and hid her eyes on my shoulder as i tried to stretch my leg out to get my cell phone out of my pocket and take pictures. 

i was extremely nervous that it was so clearly in plain view and that i knew i needed to get the pictures. but not being able to take my eyes off of the object made for fumbling fingers and tight pockets, not to mention that my daughter was scared to death. this whole process from first sighting to getting the cell phone out took about 7 - 9 seconds. 

by that time the object tilted slightly and the sun light gleemed off of its surface as it disappeared. i tried to see a trail but there was nothing. i told my daughter to relax and when we got back and told everyone they said we were pulling their legs. 

but it happened. 

the entire sighting lasted an estimated 11-12 seconds.

note: i did post this to a different website earlier tonight but forgot that there was an aura or fuzziness to the stability of the crafts "flight". i apologize for this error.

1. the craft (object) was semi-circular
2. a mercury - mirror type shell
3. slight protrusions from top center and maybe bottom as well.
4. no sound
5. no lights
6. no windows
7. slight acidic taste to faint odor (may have been any number of outside scents though)
8. no exhaust trail visible
9. craft (object) was around 12-15 ft side to side and 5-6 ft top to bottom
10. mower (tractor) encountered no motor malfunction and cell phone worked fine once in hand.
11. no one else saw a thing from what i know.

thank you for your time.
content.summary: Silent, oval, ominous, shiny...

content.detailedDescription:
Was trying to take pic of military jet in the sky and
using my binoculurs saw maybe like other planes or far away
birds wasn't sure so i pointed my camera in that direction
which was above goat island,i was at a hotel in canada--the
fallsview casino hotel on the 10th fl.And using full zoom
that my camera had i pointed it toward the sky in the direction
above goat island and took the pic and when i got home and uploaded the pic to my computer this is what i saw....Looks like 4 objects all having
the same disc shape with a white oval center...I did try to highlight
two of the disc to bring out more of their detail
content.summary: Shot pic in the sky above goat island.

content.detailedDescription: I watched from our plane at 34,000 ft, a ball of light, about 4 times the disk size of the sun.  the speed matched the plane and it was visiable for about 20 min off and on.  it was below the plane and off to the side and as the cloud layer thinned or thickened it disappeared and you could see clouds pass between us.  i thought it might be some kind of reflection because it looked like the sun, so bright, when seen through a fog.  it finally disappeared.  nobody else on the plane said anything about it and when i mentioned it to a lady passenger she said she didn't see anything either. the flight was between detroit and seattle and i think the sighting was over spokane approximately.
content.summary: Glowing ball of light matched speed of jet and faded in and out behind clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i and another couple were returning from dinner at trattoria lisina restaurant in driftwood, texas.  we were on fm 1826 just south of its intersection with highway 45.  at 11:10 pm my friend in the back seat of the car said "hey, there is a ufo."  i immediately pulled the car over onto the grass.  including myself, there were four observers of this phenomenon- the others were my wife and the couple accompanying us in our vehicle.

the sky was low overcast.  there was a circular donut-shaped light (with a fluorescent-like quality or color temperature) that could be seen rising from lower on the horizon about rooftop level with the houses to a position about 75 to 85 degrees up.  it would twist and turn almost kite-like, then disappear only to immediately reappear low on the horizon again.  my best guess is that it was about 600 to 1000 yards distant.  as it rose into the sky, it made a tesla coil-like sound that varied with the brightness of the object.  as the object would rise and get brighter, the sound would intensify, its loudness being directly proportional to the brightness of the object.  what appeared to be a second trailing light would intermittently discharge about every thirty seconds or so, always a uniform distance below and to the left of the donut-shaped circle of light.  i did not notice the red light until about five minutes into the sighting.  the light appeared to the east southeast of our position.  it appeared to rise and mix into the clouds which seemed to partially obscure the light/object/craft. as whatever it was rose into the air, it seemed to maintain a more or less uniform distance from us as though it was pivoting about our position.

after about 10 minutes, it disappeared low on the horizon and did not reappear.  we then left.  i took photos with my iphone but all they show is a pinpoint of light in the sky.

after we arrived at our house and our guests left for their home, i returned to the site and drove through the neighborhood looking for signs of whatever it was that we had observed with no success.
content.summary: Observed white donut-shaped light in the sky with intermittent red light discharge accompanied by crackling "tesla coil-like" sound that varied in loudness with the brightness of the object.

content.detailedDescription:
El 15 de febrero de 2004 me encontraba en la casa de campo de mi hermana que est��� como a 30 km. al este de la capital de panam���, en un ���rea monta���osa que se llama cerro azul. ese domingo me puse de pie temprano y me provoc��� tomar unas fotos del amanecer con mi c���mara digital. tom��� 2 fotos con intervalo de 2 minutos, hacia una misma ���rea y no not��� nada extra���o a simple vista, sin embargo cuando reviso las fotos me percato que en la primera foto que tom��� a las 6:19am, hab���a un objeto brillante y pens��� que era un lucero o un planeta, me dispuse a ver hacia el ���rea donde tom��� las fotos y no hab���a nada en el cielo.
esto es lo ���nico que les puedo decir, no tengo idea que es este objeto.
en busca de saber que explicaci���n me pod���an dar sobre la foto, me contact��� en ese mismo a���o con la apaa (asociaci���n paname���a de aficionados a la astronom���a) quienes se reun���an en la universidad tecnol���gica de panam���. les llev��� la foto, la analizaron y no me dieron una explicaci���n.
tambi���n les escrib��� y les envi��� la foto en octubre del a���o pasado a la gente de ufo hunters del programa que pasan por history channel, pero parece que no les import��� y nunca me respondieron.
esta noche vi su programa ovnis en la tierra por discovery channel y me gust��� mucho, por esta raz���n les escribo y comparto las 2 fotos que tom���.
por ���ltimo quiero decirles que soy una persona muy seria, tengo 44 a���os de edad, trabajo en el sector bancario hace varios a���os y no tengo ninguna intenci���n ni necesidad de cometer fraude ni enga���ar con fotos montadas y dem���s, solo deseo que me comenten de la foto, que les parece y que podr��� ser este objeto.
gracias
content.summary: El ovni no lo vi a simple vista, salió en la foto que tomé.

content.detailedDescription:
The ufo is like a disc wiht ligths red and green . maybe can make the history in spanish my inglesh is to bad...If you have people spanish send mi iformation my email kendall-106@hotmail.Com.
i have a true history real. then talk whit me and see the ufo.Sorry my inglish.
content.summary: Like a disk with lights reds like eyes green lights little. aliens like a people.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my chair in the living room" that looks over our lake" watching t.V. when i noticed someone outside. i took my dog "brody" outside with me when we got about halfway down to the lake his hair stood up on his back and something moved by the water. i stopped and my dog turned in front of me and ran back to the house i tripped when he bolted around me and as i looked back i swear i saw a skinny person run on the lake to the dock 3 houses down.

i went back into the house but couldn't sleep that night so i took my dog in the car and drove around the neighborhood until i felt comfortable.

3 weeks later "yesturday" i saw something again this time i took a flash light and saw something that didn't have a face and this time it ran across the entire lake. unfortunately my dog is the only other witness and i don't want to tell anyone else. any ideas????????
content.summary: Something ran across my lake.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife was and daughter were yelling that i need to come out side and see this.  i had just got in bed. i ran out side and was so amazed by what i saw i came back in the house got dressed and went out on the back deck. there were 4 very bright lights in a stationary position.
they started to spin in a circluar motion. one light went out, a third
started to flicker and went out.  i called the next door neighbor to make sure someone else from another household saw what we were seeing.
the neighbor saw the 2 lights and then they both went out.
i'm not really a believer of this stuff but this really freaked me out.
the area it was in is a state park w/a large lake, very woody and quite.
the other freaky thing is....We could see the lights and the motion of the lights but we took pictures and you could see the lights when i took the picture but nothing is on the memory stick, same with the video camera, we could see the lights through the camera but the videao is black.
content.summary: Circle of lights rotating.

content.detailedDescription: In november of 2005 me my wife and son witnessed 10 to twelve redesh ornge balls in the night sky we watched them for 45 min crossing back and forth we new it was something spesial not normal did not know what to do or whay to think i wanted to wake the nieghbors but we just moved in and did not want to seem crazy. it was so weird seeing something you can not explain. it has not been my first time with ufo;s but for my family it was. it made them believe or atleast wonder what was happening. i have had what i would call personal incounters though out my life only now do i wonder if my incounters meen something . i have had things happen to me i can not explain. hard to put into words. i am not the best typest or speller i would have to tell some one me story to make them understand. i have only told my close friends even then its had to believe. how do you explain something with long fingers holding you down scared to death can not move but i could see in and out. wanting to get away but cant.  the next time it happend i was with friends i was watching tv they where sleeping one the floor a light took over the whole room a soft white light it started small but took over the room i yelled at my friends hey hey do you see this the would not answer i keeped yelling to them as soon as they answered me the light went away in the same way it came but it went from big to small my friends believed me but explained it as a religous sight. i didnt know so i let it go. but i found myself studing ufo books vidios and tv shows about ufos always wondering why i feel this way and why for so long
content.summary: Twelve glowing objects in night sky in a formation moving back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard letting my dog pee, when i noticed two stars in the sky that i had never noticed before. i often stargaze while i'm out back with my dog, so i knew that something was different.  they then both began to move west. i instantly ran inside to get my video camera. when i came back out, they had moved about 45 degrees to the west from when i left them.  up until this point, they were an equal distance apart. they then both blanked out and then instantly reappeared much further apart. they did this twice. the entire time that i was trying to film them, my cheap auto focus video camera couldn't hardly pick them up. then the most westward one sent out three very bright and distinct strobes. then the second one replied with a series of strobes itself. they then began to move at a slightly faster pace, whilst continuing to strobe to each other. at no time were any of the strobe sequences the same. if one sent out three strobes, the other would do a different number of strobes.  it was extremely obvious that the two ufos were communicating with one another. i continued to try to film them as they continued westward and out of my sight line.  once i could no longer see them, i got my iphone and googled mufon oklahoma, and called the number listed, and told the person what had just occurred. being a former police officer, i have had numerous hours of training in observation. these were absolutely not airplanes. airplanes don't disappear and reappear miles from where they just were in an instant. there was no sound, but even if they were emitting sound, they were so high up that i wouldn't have been able to hear them. when you witness something like this, it gives you a feeling inside that is absolutely unique. it's like you're hit with the realization that you are actually witnessing a ufo incident, and the feeling is just indescribable. but to try to put into words how it makes you feel is like the most scared that you could be, mixed with the most excited you could be, mixed with the most confused that you could be.  humans do not have flying machines that can do these things.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 ufos flying s x sw strobing to each other. disappearing and reappearing.

content.detailedDescription:
This witness emailed rufos (roundtown ufo society) circleville ohio
and they forwarded it to me (f.I.9426 mufon) since i investigate their sighting reports.
i first emailed the witness and then called him and he described the sighting as follows:
on sunday march 15,2009 at approximately 10:30pm that his son 
ran into the house to get the camera when he spotted a strange light in the sky getting closer and closer.The rest of the witnesses followed outdoors 5 total
the witness described seeing a shiny golden ball coming straight toward them then stopping within a mile from them then,zigging and zagging.Looped,wiggled from side to side,and up and down.The object then suddenly took off to the s.W.In a straight path toward bristol leaving a trail behind it as it left their view at a very fast speed.
the sky was clear,and witness stated there were no other aircraft in the sky.
the witnesses son(brett) took a photo(attached)
content.summary: A golden bright light doing very wierd movements in night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I saw when i was young about ten turning,eleven im 30 now, me my father went to pick up  my mother from work with my younger brother and sister my father parked the car near the fence near bridge the only light was a florecent light a top of the door on the building itself so enough light that we were'nt scared to get out at that time, we waited in car for my mom, my father fell asleep so me and my brother and sister step outside and did what kids do started playing, but since it was a dark lot near a railroad track and bridge so it covered alot of the glare that city lights emit so you could see the stars perfect so as we where looking up a triangle shaped craft came into view moving very slow i told my little brother to look up and also my little sister i thought it might've been some sort of plane and my eyes stayed glued to i just made me feel excited and scared i tried to figure out what it was, it had a white lights on all three edges and a red colored one in the middle and it had like a writing on it like outlining the lights it kept bothering me all this years my kid brother and sis cant seem to remember that well, i saw a u.F.O show where they showed a triangle shape one not to long ago and when they show it it send chills down my spine and i felt scared and it like brought me back to that point and i got a good enough glimpse of it to remember it but it wasnt black it was more like a gunmetal dark copper. i tell people about it and they laugh but thats the way it happened never saw anything like it again but it bothers me so much that i had to tell someone who might not find it so outrageous the location was of plain st in lowell mass by a factory that used to make plastic holders for vegetables and others things and traveling east to west i kept looking at it until it dissapered behind the tree line well i know its been a long time but just wanted to share my experience and thats what i remember well thanks for listening
content.summary: It was a triangle
